title: Can I get CSe with specialization through PES Registration (JEE) ?
content: My nta score is 92 in jee (or 92%ile) .. can I get cse with specialization in PES electronic City campus ? I have heard that cutoff for JEE will go on ease due to recent changes in Pessat please let me know 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

comments.body:
1. Nobody knows if you can get a seat or not. 

It looks possible that you can get it in ECITY but again.. don't quote me to it. 

2. There are thousands of people who are trying to get into PES with their JEE percentile and I don't think removing pessat will ease the cutoff for JEE entrance

3. There were no recent changes in pessat. The last change was almost 9-10 months back

  
4. THE MOST IMPORTANT. TO ALL THE JUNIORS WHO ARE TRYING TO JOIN PES, DO NOT SPAM ABOUT YOUR PERCENTILE. DO NOT      do not      Do NOt     dO NOt spam
K I will delete the post acc to the 4th point
